expense.description: expense the org is able to make based on the income, target and split

income_target.description: Target income to pay base salaries

total_weight.description: total weights for token emission allocations

Decimal.description:
A fixed-point decimal value with 18 fractional digits, i.e. Decimal(1_000_000_000_000_000_000) == 1.0

The greatest possible value that can be represented is 340282366920938463463.374607431768211455 (which is (2^128 - 1) / 10^18)

SubscriptionState.description: Keeps track of the active subscribers. Is updated each time a sub joins/leaves Used to calculate income.
